biotools.summary: XNAT for Preclinical Imaging Centers (XNAT-PIC) is a free and open-source Windows desktop application, which offers several tools to expand the XNAT core functionalities to support the preclinical imaging community and to promote open science practices. XNAT-PIC has been developed in collaboration with the University of Turin (UniTO) and the Institute of Biostructures and Bioimaging, National Research Council of Italy (IBB-CNR), and was supported by EU projects and Euro-BioImaging. https://www.eurobioimaging.eu/image-data-services/tool-development/preclinical-data-tools/
